name: Tumblr - Mario Gomez (Black 03 - Germany)
description:
A black theme of Mario Gomez with die Mannschaft.
The picture belong to Emir Haveric: http://www.haveric.com/look/german-soccer-team/
The theme has been made for a resolution of 1280x800, but it may fit good in other resolutions.


INSTRUCTIONS

1. Install Stylish.
- For Firefox: https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/stylish/
- For Google Chrome: https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/fjnbnpbmkenffdnngjfgmeleoegfcffe

2. Click the 'Install with Stylish' button below.

3. Check out your new Tumblr dashboard!


Feel free to follow me at JohanPRosenberg.tumblr.com :)
additional_info: The image has a size of 653x700 and it is aligned on the top.
